1.SceneDescription: Monica and Chandler's, Rachel is still looking out the window as Joey enters.

lines.Line: (sees Rachel) Oh, uh, hey Rach. I uh, I was just coming over here toNEWLINEuh… Oh wait, I don’t have to lie to you, you don’t live here anymore. Uh,NEWLINEI’m eating their food. What are you doing
Ross is on a date with my sister and they shut the drapes two andNEWLINEa-half-hours ago

Whoa, I didn’t know we could date your sister

lines.Character: (Chandler and Monica enter from their room and Joey quickly hides the bag of potatoNEWLINEchips behind his back
lines.Line: Chandler and Monica enter from their room and Joey quickly hides the bag of potatoNEWLINEchips behind his back.
Joey we know you steal our food
Joey we know you steal our food

Joey offers them some potato chips.

Yeah. And y’know who should’ve shut their drapes? Is thatNEWLINEperverted old couple two doors over
I can’t believe Ross went out with Rachel’s sister! WhenNEWLINEChandler made out with my sister I was mad at him for 10 years

2.SceneDescription: Monica and Chandler's, Chandler, Monica, Phoebe, and Joey are watching ET.

lines.Character: (We see the TV and it’s the last scene where ET is saying goodbye
lines.Line: We see the TV and it’s the last scene where ET is saying goodbye.
Oh y’know what’s sadder than this? Bambi. I cried forNEWLINEthree days with that movie. No wait two! Because on the third day my mother killed herselfNEWLINEso I was partly crying for that
(totally not crying) Well see now that I can see crying over, but BambiNEWLINEis a cartoon
(crying) You didn’t cry when Bambi’s mother died
(crying) You didn’t cry when Bambi’s mother died
(crying) You didn’t cry when Bambi’s mother died
Yes it was very sad when the guy stopped drawing the deer
Chandler there’s nothing wrong with crying! I mean you don’tNEWLINEhave to be so macho all the time
Yeah you’re right. I don’t know what I was thinking
No, I guess I just never really cried. Y’know? I’m not aNEWLINEcrying kind of guy
Come on man there’s gotta be something that gets you choked up! LikeNEWLINEuh, uh oh, what if you saw a three-legged puppy
I’d be sad sure, but I wouldn’t cry
I’d be sad sure, but I wouldn’t cry
I’d be sad sure, but I wouldn’t cry
Okay, what if the puppy said, Help me Chandler. All the otherNEWLINEpuppies pick on me
Cry?! I just found a talking puppy, I’m rich
Cry?! I just found a talking puppy, I’m rich
Oh, I’ve got it! I have got it! (Gets up and gets something fromNEWLINEthe dresser underneath the TV.) Pictures from your childhood. This will get you goingNEWLINEgood
Chandler starts paging through the album.
Chandler starts paging through the album.
Chandler starts paging through the album.
All right, what’s going on there? (Points to a picture.
Oh, that’s Parent’s Day, first grade. That’s me withNEWLINEthe janitor Martin
Oh they didn’t want to come
Oh they didn’t want to come
So that story doesn’t make you cry
So that story doesn’t make you cry
No! Look, I don’t cry! It’s not a big deal! Okay?
No! It’s not okay! It’s not okay at all!! You’re deadNEWLINEinside!

3.SceneDescription: Central Perk, time lapse, Rachel is at the counter as Jill enters.

lines.Line: You’ll never believe what just happened, Ross just totally blew meNEWLINEoff and he didn’t even tell me why

Ohhh well. Y’know what honey? The best thing to do to get over aNEWLINEguy is to start dating someone else. Oh! There is this great guy you will love at workNEWLINEnamed Bob! He’s a real up-and-comer in Human Resources
Y’know, thanks for trying to cheer me up, but I’m not gonna dateNEWLINEsome random guy from your work

It’s probably because not mature enough. Or smart enough. Maybe heNEWLINEdoesn’t like the way I dress—No that can’t be it. It’s really gotta beNEWLINEthe smart thing. Oh I’m so stupid! I’m just like this incredibly prettyNEWLINEstupid girl
No honey, okay, okay, you wanna know why Ross canceled the date? BecauseNEWLINEI asked him to
Because you are my sister and Ross and I have this huge history
I don’t understand, do you want to go out with Ross
I don’t understand, do you want to go out with Ross
You don’t want him, but you don’t want me to have him
(changing the subject) Y’know Bob in Human Resources
(changing the subject) Y’know Bob in Human Resources
Ugh! I cannot believe you did this too me! You had me doubting how smart INEWLINEwas! (Gasps) You had me doubting my fashion sense
Look, this is not that big of a deal! You just don’t date Ross!NEWLINEThere’s a million other guys out there, you just
Hey! You have no right to tell me what to do
Hey! You have no right to tell me what to do
I’m not telling you what to do! I am telling you what not toNEWLINEdo
Why are you so jealous of me
Why are you so jealous of me
Why are you so jealous of me
Why are you so jealous of me
Jill this is not about me being jealous of you! This is about you beingNEWLINEa brat! Wanting what you can’t have
Can’t have?! Excuse me, the only thing I can’t have is dairy!NEWLINE(Starts to storm out.
All right, all right, well you just blew your chances at dating Bob
All right, all right, well you just blew your chances at dating Bob

4.SceneDescription: Monica and Chandler's, Chandler is reading Chicken Soup for the Soul asNEWLINEMonica enters.

lines.Line: Hey! (He quickly tries to hide the book by throwing it under theNEWLINEcouch, only the couch has no back and it slides into the kitchen.
(picking up the book) Chicken Soup for the Soul?
There’s no back to this couch
There’s no back to this couch
There’s no back to this couch
Why are you reading this? You hate this kind of stuff
Yeah I know, but I figured a shot y’know? Maybe one of thoseNEWLINEstories would make me cry and then you wouldn’t think I was y’know, all deadNEWLINEinside
Oh that’s so sweet! Look Chandler I don’t care if youNEWLINEcan’t cry, I love you
Oh that’s so sweet! Look Chandler I don’t care if youNEWLINEcan’t cry, I love you
Oh that makes me feel so warm in my hollow tin chest
No, I mean, come on, seriously think about it, we get married,NEWLINEwe’re up at the altar and I’m like this. (Makes a bored face.
I won’t care, because I know you will be feeling it all in here.NEWLINE(Points to her heart.

Yeah! And if, and if we have a baby one-day, and the doctor hands it toNEWLINEyou in the delivery room and you don’t cry, so what! And-and-and, and if we take himNEWLINEto college and come home and see his empty room for the first time, and you got nothing,NEWLINEit won’t matter to me
Okay, well I won’t uh, worry about this anymore then
Okay, well I won’t uh, worry about this anymore then

And-and-and if I die, from a long illness. And you’re writing outNEWLINEmy eulogy and you open a desk drawer and you find a note from me that says, I willNEWLINEalways be with you, and you still can’t shed one tiny tear, I know you’llNEWLINEbe crying a river inside
What?! You can’t shed a tear for your dead wife!! Now, I left you aNEWLINEnote from the beyond
So you didn’t mean any of that?
So you didn’t mean any of that?

Yeah, I can talk them into giving you like, 30 dollars

No!! No way! No! And stop using my name! And shame on you! (Yells intoNEWLINEthe apartment) And shame on all of you! You’re disgusting! Especially you (points toNEWLINEsomeone) with that! (Storms away.

lines.Line: So, I just came from the company Ursula works for

Oh no! No! I know how to handle it

All right, I’ll give you a hint. From porn! Okay? (He triesNEWLINEto rush his girlfriend out.) Yeah your pervert boyfriend watched me in a porno movie! (ToNEWLINEJoey) See

7.SceneDescription: Central Perk, everyone is there as Jill enters.

lines.Line: All right, I’m leaving! Because I’m not going to spend one moreNEWLINEday with someone whose out to sabotage my every move. That’s you Rachel
